tool.name: Minfi Get Annotation
tool.description: get annotation for various Illumina methylation objects

configfiles.configfile:
require("minfi", quietly = TRUE) GRSet <- get(load('$input1'))
annotation <- getAnnotation(GRSet)
write.table(annotation, '$output1')

tool.help: Tool returns requested annotation as a data frame, with each row corresponding to a methylation loci
